description: Get the information about an existing global endpoint. For more information about global endpoints, see Making applications Regional-fault tolerant with global endpoints and event replication in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide .

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the endpoint you want to get information about. For example, "Name":"us-east-2-custom_bus_A-endpoint".

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: RoutingConfig
nested_items.description: The routing configuration of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: FailoverConfig
nested_items.description: The failover configuration for an endpoint. This includes what triggers failover and what happens when it's triggered.

nested_items.name: HealthCheck
nested_items.description: The ARN of the health check used by the endpoint to determine whether failover is triggered.

nested_items.name: Secondary
nested_items.description: The Region that events are routed to when failover is triggered or event replication is enabled.

nested_items.name: ReplicationConfig
nested_items.description: Whether replication is enabled or disabled for the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: EventBuses
nested_items.description: The event buses being used by the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: EventBusArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event bus the endpoint is associated with.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used by the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: EndpointUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the endpoint you asked for information about.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason the endpoint you asked for information about is in its current state.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the endpoint you asked for information about was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the endpoint you asked for information about was modified.
